column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. They have the best tapas!  Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba's atmosphere is dark and romantic with soft lighting. Service has always been superb.  Sangria is fantastic.  Must try patatas braves
column2: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column4: and garlic potato salad.  Enough gluten-free options to satisfy the mother-in-law as well. I visit every time I return to Chicago. LOVE IT!
